page.title: 15POPULATION
page.content: Fourteen children in our class of twenty four were born locally.The rest were born in America, London, York, Cornwall and Scotland. {Old People} Mrs.Dunn is 86 years old and has lived in North Newton for a long time.She says she doesn't mind the changes in the village over the past 40 years,such as the new bungalows being built.She remembers a number of old customs in the village including one where people picked peas,putting them in their hats.This was called Pea Fete Day. As a child Mrs.Dunn had her school holiday during the blackberrying season so that she could go to pick fruit to earn money.Mrs.Dunn is a very chirpy old lady. By Graham,David and Lee
